sourcesContent:
<template>
    <input type="checkbox" id="checkbox" class="cbfg-inle" />
    <label for="checkbox" class="checkbox-label"></label>
</template>
<style lang="less" scoped>
/* 隐藏原生复选框 */
.cbfg-inle {
    display: none;
}

/* 自定义复选框的基本样式 */
.checkbox-label {
    border-radius: 8px;
    height: 24px;
    min-width: 24px;
    appearance: none;
    background-color: #202a39;
    border: none;
    margin-right: 8px;
    overflow: hidden;
    pointer-events: none;
    position: relative;
    transition: background-color 0.1s ease-in-out;
}

/* 当复选框被选中时改变label的背景颜色 */
.cbfg-inle:checked+.checkbox-label {
    background-color: #1bb83d;
}

/* 添加自定义对勾样式 */
.cbfg-inle:checked+.checkbox-label:after {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    left: 7px;
    top: 8px;
    width: 10px;
    height: 6px;
    border: solid #000;
    border-width: 0 0 2px 2px;
    transform: rotate(-45deg);
}
</style>
